circumstances: Jeremy Wright was reported missing from his home at 55 Diana Avenue, Glasgow. On the day of his disappearance, Jeremy was scheduled to visit a relative’s house on Balmuildy Road. His daughter and sister both expressed concern when he failed to arrive and later could not be reached by phone. His daughter attempted to contact him multiple times before alerting the police. Searches began, focusing on nearby snow areas, as it was known that Jeremy enjoyed brisk walks in such settings.
